tasks.task: Implement rotational grazing system for cattle.
subtasks: Move cattle to next designated grazing area.
Monitor pasture health and adjust grazing schedule as needed.
Control weeds and pests in resting pastures.
Ensure proper animal health through managed grazing.
Manage water resources by optimizing pasture recovery.
